# {{< fa briefcase >}} Work Experience

```{python}
#| echo: false
import yaml
from datetime import datetime

with open("data/work_experience.yml", "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
    jobs = yaml.safe_load(f)

def parse_date(date_str):
    if date_str.lower() == "present":
        return datetime.max
    try:
        return datetime.strptime(date_str, "%b %Y")
    except:
        return datetime.min

jobs_sorted = sorted(jobs, key=lambda j: parse_date(j["end"]), reverse=True)

with open("cv_sections/work_experience.qmd", "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
    for i, job in enumerate(jobs_sorted):
        f.write(f"**{job['role']} | [{job['company']}]({job['company-url']})** | *{job['start']} - {job['end']}* \n")
        f.write("\\vspace{0.25em} \n\n")
        for desc in job['description']:
            f.write(f" - {desc}\n")
        if i < len(jobs_sorted) - 1:
            f.write("\n\\vspace{0.75em}\n\n")
```

# {{< fa graduation-cap >}} Education

```{python}
#| echo: false
import yaml
from datetime import datetime

with open("data/education.yml", "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
    education = yaml.safe_load(f)

education_sorted = sorted(education, key=lambda j: parse_date(j["end"]), reverse=True)

with open("cv_sections/education.qmd", "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
    for i, education in enumerate(education_sorted):
        f.write(f"**{education['degree']}** - *{education['institution']}* \n\n")
        f.write(f"*{education['start']} - {education['end']}*\n\n")
        f.write(f"{'{{< fa star >}}'} Grade: **{education['grade']}**")
        f.write("\\vspace{0.5em} \n\n")
        if education['awards']:
            f.write("**Awards:**\n\n")
            for award in education['awards']:
                f.write(f" - {award}\n")
            if i < len(education_sorted) - 1:
                f.write("\n\\vspace{1em}\n\n")
```
